name: Bargain Hunter
description: Know a bargain when you see one? Sift the gems from the garbage - and you could make it big! Play as an up-and-coming bargain hunter looking to make his or her fortune turning "trash" into cash! Start with a few bucks and aim to become fabulously wealthy... or go bust trying!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or above Processor: Modern processor Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 1920x1080 DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 1 GB available space
